bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon main frame & seatstay w/alloy chainstay, BB90 w/Precision Fit sockets, E2, internal control routing, no-cut off-road seatmast, ABP Race, Full Floater, magnesium EVO Link, replaceable derailleur hanger, 100mm travel

components.description: Bontrager Race Lite Pro TLR Disc wheel system, 15mm front hub, 135x5mm rear hub, 28 hole, center lock, Tubeless Ready
Bontrager Race X Lite Carbon Low Riser, 31.8mm, 15mm rise, 9 degree sweep
Cane Creek IS-3, E2, alloy cartridge
Shimano SLX M666 hydraulic disc brakes
Trek fork & shock sag meter, Bontrager shock pump
